sequence:
Long Island's Inner Peace

<size=45>VII 「Farewell, Dream Vacation」</size>

scripts.say: I-I’m back... hmm... I still think this place suits me best...
Ah~ If I can always stay here like this, how great would that be... then my life would have no regrets...
I’ll say it here and now, I don’t plan to go outside just so you know.
--- One last time? And you’ll buy me a new video game? And a new model toy?
Sigh...I’ll go, I’ll go already, there goes my ideal vacation---
